mapper.update: update appointment set endTime = CURTIME(), meetingNotes=#{meetingNotes}, meetingFinished ='Y' update appointment set endTime = CURTIME(), meetingNotes=#{meetingNotes}, meetingFinished ='Y' where appointmentId =#{app_id}
update appointment set startTime = CURTIME(), officialId = #{official_id}, meetingFinished = 'N' where appointmentId = #{app_id}
mapper.select: select gu.* from generaluser gu, appointment a where a.appointmentId = #{app_id} and a.userId = gu.userId

SELECT a.*,d.departmentName FROM appointment a, departmenttimeslot ds, department d WHERE a.departmentTimeId = ds.departmentTimeId AND ds.departmentId = d.departmentId and a.userId= #{userId} ORDER BY a.appointmentDate DESC
select * from appointment where departmentTimeId in ( select departmentTimeId from departmenttimeslot where departmentId=#{department_id}) and meetingFinished='N' order by appointmentId ASC Limit 0,1

select g.* from appointment a, generaluser g where a.departmentTimeId IN (select departmentTimeId from departmenttimeslot where departmentId = #{department_id}) and a.meetingFinished='N' and a.startTime='00:00:00' and g.userId=a.userId ORDER BY a.appointmentId ASC Limit 0,1
mapper.update: update appointment set meetingFinished = 'L' where appointmentId = #{appointmentId}
